title: Checkout error 500 on mobile
recommended_action: Escalate to payments engineer; collect server trace

title: Password reset emails not delivered
recommended_action: Check email provider logs and bounce metrics

title: Slow dashboard load after login
recommended_action: Investigate DB slow queries and caching layer

title: Payment declined for specific card type
recommended_action: Ask for card BIN and escalate to payments gateway

title: 2FA codes delayed or missing
recommended_action: Validate SMS provider status and retry logic

title: Mobile app crashes at checkout
recommended_action: Request crash logs and device model; escalate to mobile team

title: Invoice amounts mismatch
recommended_action: Sync ledger and run reconciliation job

title: Search returns incomplete results
recommended_action: Check indexing job and reindex if necessary

title: API rate limit errors 429
recommended_action: Suggest client-side backoff and review quota settings

title: Image upload fails for large files
recommended_action: Increase size limits or compress client images before upload

title: Refund processing delayed
recommended_action: Check payment provider ledger and refund queue

title: Feature flag not toggling for subset of users
recommended_action: Investigate feature service and rollback if necessary
